title: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67
medium: Transparent watercolor and white gouache, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed:
Upper left, graphite: No 4
Upper right, graphite: 345
description: View of a Northern Italian lake town, drawn in graphite, oval shape; framed with strawberries, green leaves; flowing blue ribbon extending from either side

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67.Transparent watercolor and white gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Gift of M. Roy Fisher. 1976-105-5.
